about.credits.para1.translation: LiveCodes is made possible by open source projects, web services and contributors. <tag-1>View Credits</tag-1>

about.credits.para2.translation: ¬© 2024 Hatem Hosny. LiveCodes is licensed under MIT License.

about.livecodes.para1.translation: <tag-1><tag-2>LiveCodes</tag-2></tag-1> is an open-source, feature-rich, client-side code playground. Currently, 90+ languages and frameworks are supported. It can be used as a standalone app or embedded in any web page.

about.livecodes.para2.translation: A powerful SDK makes it easy to integrate and communicate with playgrounds. Extensive documentation is available with code examples, live demos, and screenshots.

app.logo.title.translation: LiveCodes: A Code Playground That Just Works!

assets.add.dataURL.desc.translation: Add asset as a base64-encoded <tag-1>data url</tag-1>.

assets.add.githubPages.desc.translation: Deploy asset to GitHub Pages. The file is pushed to <tag-1>gh-pages</tag-1> branch of the repo <tag-2>livecodes-assets</tag-2> on your GitHub account. If the repo does not already exist, a public repo will be created.

assets.processAsset.deployNotice.translation: The asset should be available on this URL soon (~1 min).

backup.backup.desc.translation: Backup LiveCodes data, so that it can be later restored on this or other devices. <tag-1></tag-1> Please visit the <tag-2>documentations</tag-2> for details.

backup.error.atLeastOneStore.translation: Please select at least one store to backup

backup.restore.desc.translation: Restore previously backed-up LiveCodes data. <tag-1></tag-1> If you choose to replace current content, you may want to back it up first. <tag-2></tag-2> Please visit the <tag-3>documentations</tag-3> for details.

broadcast.desc.translation: Broadcast the result page to other browsers/devices in real time. Please visit the <tag-1>documentations</tag-1> for details.

core.changeLanguage.message.translation: Loading {{lang}}. This may take a while!

core.unload.notSaved.translation: Changes you made may not be saved.

customSettings.desc.translation: <tag-1></tag-1> For further details, please refer to the <tag-2> documentation </tag-2>

deploy.create.desc.translation: A new <tag-1>public</tag-1> repo will be created. The result page will be pushed to <tag-2>gh-pages</tag-2> branch.

deploy.existing.desc.translation: A new commit will be added to <tag-1>gh-pages</tag-1> branch.

editorSettings.codeJarDesc.translation: <tag-1></tag-1> * The marked features are not available in CodeJar.

embed.desc.translation: Please check the <tag-1>documentations</tag-1> for advanced configurations.

generic.tagline.translation: A Code Playground That Just Works!

import.bulk.desc.translation: Bulk import multiple projects to your saved projects. Projects can be exported from the <tag-1>Saved Projects</tag-1> screen.

import.code.desc.translation: Supported Sources: <tag-1> <tag-2>GitHub gist</tag-2> <tag-3>GitHub file</tag-3> <tag-4>Directory in a GitHub repo</tag-4> <tag-5>Gitlab snippet</tag-5> <tag-6>Gitlab file</tag-6> <tag-7>Directory in a Gitlab repo</tag-7> <tag-8>JS Bin</tag-8> <tag-9>Raw code</tag-9> <tag-10>Code in web page DOM</tag-10> <tag-11>Code in zip file</tag-11> <tag-12>Code in image (OCR)</tag-12> <tag-13>Official playgrounds<tag-14></tag-14>(TypeScript and Vue)</tag-13> </tag-1> Please visit the <tag-15>documentations</tag-15> for details.

import.json.desc.translation: Import a single project JSON to editor. A project can be exported from app menu ‚Üí Export ‚Üí Export Project (JSON).

keyboardShortcuts.editorShortcuts.translation: For the list of code editor keyboard shortcuts, see <tag-1> VS Code shortcuts</tag-1>

login.desc.translation: <tag-1>By logging in, you agree that <tag-2>cookies</tag-2> may be stored on your device.</tag-1> <tag-3> <tag-4>Why are these permissions required?</tag-4> </tag-3> <tag-5> <tag-6>How to change/revoke permissions?</tag-6> </tag-5>

menu.showSpacing.hint.translation: Press Alt/Option and move your cursor over result page

open.noData.desc.translation: You can save a project from (settings menu > Save) or by the keyboard shortcut (Ctrl/‚åò + S).

recoverPrompt.desc.translation: Your last project has unsaved changes!

recoverPrompt.prompt.heading.translation: <tag-1></tag-1>Do you want to recover it now?

resources.urlDesc.translation: Add stylesheet/script URLs. Each URL should be in a separate line.

savePrompt.prompt.heading.translation: The changes you made may not be saved. <tag-1></tag-1> Do you want to save now?

sync.create.desc.translation: A new <tag-1>private</tag-1> repo will be created. Your LiveCodes local data will be synchronized with <tag-2>main</tag-2> branch.

sync.existing.desc.translation: Your LiveCodes local data will be synchronized with <tag-1>main</tag-1> branch.

templates.noUserTemplates.desc.translation: You can save a project as a template from <tag-1></tag-1>(App menu > Save as > Template).

testSettings.desc.translation: <tag-1></tag-1> For further details, please refer to the <tag-2>documentation</tag-2>

welcome.recover.unsavedChanges.translation: Your last project had unsaved changes:
